name: Dark as Hell
description:
A simple platformer where you have to use the darkness to hide from the hellish monsters of the underworld.

---
Made over two weeks for #LOWREZJAM 2016 where the challenge was to make a game fit into a 64x64 resolution. https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016

---
Special thanks goes to Ben (@SunraHeadgear) and Barney (@Powerhoof) for their sweet little naked dude.

And please follow me at @nuclearfriend if you want to see more! :)
